name: squadcast
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing squadcast cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`squadcast` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/squadcast/terraform-provider-squadcast).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing squadcast cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/squadcast/terraform-provider-squadcast)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-squadcast` repo](https://github.com/valisinsights/pulumi-squadcast/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-squadcast` repo](https://github.com/squadcast/terraform-provider-squadcast/issues).

> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,

refreshToken.description: The refresh token, This can be created from user profile

region.description: The region you are currently hosted on.Supported values are "us" and "eu"

basicExpressions.description: The basic expression which needs to be evaluated to be true for this rule to apply.

dependencyDeduplication.description: Denotes if dependent services should also be deduplicated

expression.description: The expression which needs to be evaluated to be true for this rule to apply.

isBasic.description: is_basic will be true when users use the drop down selectors which will have lhs, op & rhs value, whereas it will be false when they use the advanced mode and it would have the expression for it's value

type.description: Escalation policy owner type. (user or squad or team)

delayMinutes.description: The number of minutes to wait before repeating the escalation policy

times.description: The number of times you want this escalation policy to be repeated, maximum allowed to repeat 3 times

routeToId.description: The id of the entity (user, escalation policy, squad) for which we are routing this incident.

routeToType.description: Type of the entity for which we are routing this incident - User, Escalation Policy or Squad

type.description: Runbook owner type. (user or squad or team)

id.description: The ID of the notification rule

serviceId.description: The ID of the service in which the user want to create an incident

squadIds.description: List of Squad ID's who should be alerted via email.

userIds.description: List of user ID's who should be alerted via email.

id.description: The ID of the monitoring rule

name.description: The name of monitoring check."Supported values are "breached*error*budget", "unhealthy*slo","increased*false*positives", "remaining*error_budget"

threshold.description: Threshold for the monitoring checkOnly supported for rules name "increased*false*positives" and "remaining*error*budget"

dayOfWeek.description: Defines the day of the week for the shift. If not specified, the timeslot is active on all days of the week.

duration.description: Defines the duration of each shift. (in minutes)

startHour.description: Defines the start hour of the each shift in the schedule timezone.

startMinute.description: Defines the start minute of the each shift in the schedule timezone.

type.description: The type of the maintainer. (user, team or squad)

repeatTill.description: Till when you want to repeat this Maintenance mode

basicExpressions.description: The basic expression which needs to be evaluated to be true for this rule to apply.

expression.description: The expression which needs to be evaluated to be true for this rule to apply.

isBasic.description: is_basic will be true when users use the drop down selectors which will have lhs, op & rhs value, whereas it will be false when they use the advanced mode and it would have the expression for it's value

isTimebased.description: is_timebased will be true when users use the time based suppression rule

timeslots.description: The timeslots for which this rule should be applied.

tags.description: The tags supposed to be set for a given payload(incident), Expression must be set when tags are empty and must contain addTags parameters.

provider.description:
The provider type for the squadcast package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

squadcast:index/sebform:Sebform.description:
[Squadcast Webforms](https://support.squadcast.com/webforms/webforms) allows organizations to expand their customer support by hosting public Webforms, so their customers can quickly create an alert from outside the Squadcast ecosystem. Not only this, but internal stakeholders can also leverage Webforms for easy alert creation.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.SquadcastFunctions;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.GetTeamArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.GetUserArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.GetServiceArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.Sebform;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.SebformArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.SebformOwnerArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.SebformServiceArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.SebformInputFieldArgs;
import com.pulumi.squadcast.inputs.SebformSeverityArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var exampleTeam = SquadcastFunctions.getTeam(GetTeamArgs.builder()
            .name("example test name")
            .build());

        final var exampleUser = SquadcastFunctions.getUser(GetUserArgs.builder()
            .email("test@example.com")
            .build());

        final var exampleService = SquadcastFunctions.getService(GetServiceArgs.builder()
            .name("example service name")
            .teamId(exampleTeam.applyValue(getTeamResult -> getTeamResult.id()))
            .build());

        final var exampleService2 = SquadcastFunctions.getService(GetServiceArgs.builder()
            .name("example service name 2")
            .teamId(exampleTeam.applyValue(getTeamResult -> getTeamResult.id()))
            .build());

        var exampleWebformSebform = new Sebform("exampleWebformSebform", SebformArgs.builder()        
            .teamId(exampleTeam.applyValue(getTeamResult -> getTeamResult.id()))
            .owner(SebformOwnerArgs.builder()
                .type("user")
                .id(exampleUser.applyValue(getUserResult -> getUserResult.id()))
                .build())
            .services(            
                SebformServiceArgs.builder()
                    .serviceId(exampleService.applyValue(getServiceResult -> getServiceResult.id()))
                    .alias("example service alias")
                    .build(),
                SebformServiceArgs.builder()
                    .serviceId(exampleService2.applyValue(getServiceResult -> getServiceResult.id()))
                    .build())
            .customDomainName("example.com")
            .header("formHeader")
            .description("formDescription")
            .title("formTitle")
            .footerText("footerText")
            .footerLink("footerLink")
            .emailOns(            
                "acknowledged",
                "resolved",
                "triggered")
            .inputFields(            
                SebformInputFieldArgs.builder()
                    .label("test_label")
                    .options(                    
                        "test1",
                        "test2")
                    .build(),
                SebformInputFieldArgs.builder()
                    .label("test_label2")
                    .options("test1")
                    .build())
            .tags(Map.ofEntries(
                Map.entry("tagKey", "tagValue"),
                Map.entry("tagKey2", "tagValue2")
            ))
            .build());

        var exampleWebformIndex_sebformSebform = new Sebform("exampleWebformIndex/sebformSebform", SebformArgs.builder()        
            .teamId(exampleTeam.applyValue(getTeamResult -> getTeamResult.id()))
            .owner(SebformOwnerArgs.builder()
                .type("user")
                .id(exampleUser.applyValue(getUserResult -> getUserResult.id()))
                .build())
            .services(            
                SebformServiceArgs.builder()
                    .serviceId(exampleService.applyValue(getServiceResult -> getServiceResult.id()))
                    .alias("example service alias")
                    .build(),
                SebformServiceArgs.builder()
                    .serviceId(exampleService2.applyValue(getServiceResult -> getServiceResult.id()))
                    .build())
            .customDomainName("example.com")
            .header("formHeader")
            .description("formDescription")
            .title("formTitle")
            .footerText("footerText")
            .footerLink("footerLink")
            .emailOns(            
                "acknowledged",
                "resolved",
                "triggered")
            .severities(SebformSeverityArgs.builder()
                .type("critical")
                .label("critical")
                .build())
            .tags(Map.ofEntries(
                Map.entry("tagKey", "tagValue"),
                Map.entry("tagKey2", "tagValue2")
            ))
            .build());

    }
}
```
```yaml
resources:
  exampleWebformSebform:
    type: squadcast:Sebform
    properties:
      teamId: ${exampleTeam.id}
      owner:
        type: user
        id: ${exampleUser.id}
      services:
        - serviceId: ${exampleService.id}
          alias: example service alias
        - serviceId: ${exampleService2.id}
      customDomainName: example.com
      header: formHeader
      description: formDescription
      title: formTitle
      footerText: footerText
      footerLink: footerLink
      emailOns:
        - acknowledged
        - resolved
        - triggered
      inputFields:
        - label: test_label
          options:
            - test1
            - test2
        - label: test_label2
          options:
            - test1
      tags:
        tagKey: tagValue
        tagKey2: tagValue2
  exampleWebformIndex/sebformSebform:
    type: squadcast:Sebform
    properties:
      teamId: ${exampleTeam.id}
      owner:
        type: user
        id: ${exampleUser.id}
      services:
        - serviceId: ${exampleService.id}
          alias: example service alias
        - serviceId: ${exampleService2.id}
      customDomainName: example.com
      header: formHeader
      description: formDescription
      title: formTitle
      footerText: footerText
      footerLink: footerLink
      emailOns:
        - acknowledged
        - resolved
        - triggered
      severities:
        - type: critical
          label: critical
      tags:
        tagKey: tagValue
        tagKey2: tagValue2
variables:
  exampleTeam:
    fn::invoke:
      Function: squadcast:getTeam
      Arguments:
        name: example test name
  exampleUser:
    fn::invoke:
      Function: squadcast:getUser
      Arguments:
        email: test@example.com
  exampleService:
    fn::invoke:
      Function: squadcast:getService
      Arguments:
        name: example service name
        teamId: ${exampleTeam.id}
  exampleService2:
    fn::invoke:
      Function: squadcast:getService
      Arguments:
        name: example service name 2
        teamId: ${exampleTeam.id}
```
{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

## Import

teamID:webformName Use 'Get All Teams' API to get the id of the team

```sh
 $ pulumi import squadcast:index/sebform:Sebform example_webform "63065e992a5f9a1d5792b6c5:Webform Name"
```

abilities.

create-escalation-policies, create-postmortems, create-runbooks, create-schedules, create-services, create-slos, create-squads, create-status-pages, delete-escalation-policies, delete-postmortems, delete-runbooks, delete-schedules, delete-services, delete-slos, delete-squads, delete-status-pages, read-escalation-policies, read-postmortems, read-runbooks, read-schedules, read-services, read-slos, read-squads, read-status-pages, read-team-analytics, update-escalation-policies, update-postmortems, update-runbooks, update-schedules, update-services, update-slos, update-squads, update-status-pages
